GSD.product_version: versions from v5.4.69 to before v5.4.177
GSD.description:
PCI: pciehp: Fix infinite loop in IRQ handler upon power fault

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.177 by commit 464da38ba827f670deac6500a1de9a4f0f44c41d, it was introduced in version v5.4.69 by commit 4667358dab9cc07da044d5bc087065545b1000df. For more details please see the references link.
